@BrinkChancellor Quick lesson in spotting garbage dressed as science: The rate has no time period. Is this number of deaths per day ... every day forever? And read the small print: Lower corner says of March 2020, before this was even called a pandemic.

4.7 million Covid deaths in less than 2 years.  

When people argue against masks or vaccines by saying that Covid isn't all that dangerous please ask them how many deaths it would take to change their minds.

The utter lack of Covid vaccines in much of the world illustrates the shortcomings of philanthropy.
